Description: Built in a USA shop using quality import and USA parts. Solid mahogany body and neck finished in thin TV Yellow nitro lacquer, then completely aged to look like a vintage guitar. hand rolled fretboard for a smooth, comfy, vintage feel.This has closer to a 60's profile...very comfortable handful without feeling too full or overly thin...just right!-USA Gibson Les Paul tuning machines-USA Gibson black knobs-full size CTS low friction pots-NOS PIO .022 tone cap-Mighty Mite humbucker pickup-Vintage style cloth wiring-Electrosocket w/ Switchcraft output jack-Bigsby style tremoloWhat's not to love! The Mighty Mite pickup sounds terrific! (as with all tremolo's of this style you may want to upgrade to a roller bridge if you are dive bombing for better tuning stability.) Just to be clear...this is a great looking, nice playing guitar, NOT a Gibson guitar, and not Gibson Custom Shop quality...(but then again it's not $5000 either:) It may need set up to your liking but it plays nice here in the shop. Thanks for looking!Sorry, there is no case included. Title: RIVER RELICS LP DC JR 2018 Aged TV Yellow Nitro! Gibson Les Paul Tuners/Knobs!
